name: TERPO-Reborn 0.4.3
description:
Server mod for The Exiled-RP server. Combines some little tweaks into one mod.
- HUD doesn't hide when entering vanity camera anymore. It can still be hidden manually.
- Allows players to switch between characters if an additional SQL component is installed to the db
- Allows to lock and unlock containers, doors and crafting stations
author: Midnight
